BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions
Comment: Continuation of the September 5th Recessed Meeting

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 070433 HAK, an Urban Development Action Area Designation and Project, located at 34, 40, 42, 46 Varet Street and 25, 23, 21, 19, 13, 5 Cook Street, and the disposition of the city-owned property, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 34. Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 070434 ZSK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 34 to facilitate construction of a public parking garage.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
